# serval_user (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "serval_user" "example_user" {
  email = "email"
  first_name = "firstName"
  last_name = "lastName"
  role = "USER_ROLE_UNSPECIFIED"
}
```

## Argument Reference

This resource supports the following arguments:

- `avatar_url` (Optional) The avatar URL of the user.
- `email` (Optional) The email address of the user.
- `first_name` (Optional) The first name of the user.
- `last_name` (Optional) The last name of the user.
- `role` (Optional) The role of the user. Available values: "USER_ROLE_UNSPECIFIED", "USER_ROLE_ORG_MEMBER", "USER_ROLE_ORG_ADMIN".

## Attribute Reference

This resource exports the following attributes in addition to the arguments above:

- `id` (String) The ID of the user.
- `created_at` (String) Timestamp in RFC 3339 format.
- `deactivated_at` (String) Timestamp in RFC 3339 format.
- `name` (String) The full name of the user.

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

```shell
$ terraform import serval_user.example '<id>'
```
